title: (1) Pallet of 6" x 36" Livorna Silver Matte Wood Look Porcilen Tile (78 sqft)
item_description:
(1) Pallet of 6" x 36" Livorna Silver Matte Wood Look Porcilen Tile (78 sqft)

Porcelain Tile Approximate: 6” × 36”
Approximate sqft: 78
Pallet Dimensions: 42” × 42” × 12”
Pallet Weight: 350 lb
Surface: Matte
Seller States: Porcelain tile is rated for floor and wall applications. Pallets are wrapped and strapped for shipping.
